name: cakey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to a cake in how it feels, looks, or tastes: The centre is a slightly moist, cakey, chocolate goo. He makes a cakey fruit bread.
forming a thick, partly dry layer: I particularly like this make-up as it's not heavy or cakey.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm eating a chocolate cheesecake with a cakey crust. You want your brownies to be cakey on the outside, fudgy in the middle.It is ever so slightly too caky and too sweet.This is a ripe, almost fruit cakey red wine with plenty of plum and raspberry richness. If you use too much powder, it looks cakey.The ground was covered with a black, cakey motor oil. The new matte foundations are less thick and caky.
